        Check the user and password
        Parameters:
        username - the user name

      • setPassword

        Set the password for an existing user (no check if the user is allowed to change the password)
        Parameters:
        username - user name for which the password should be changed
        password - new password of the user

      • generateSalt

        private static java.lang.String generateSalt()
        Generate a salt to ensure a safe password. The salt and the password are hashed together and the hash is saved in the database
        Returns:
        a salt which is a random String with the length 10

      • hashSaltWithPW

        private static java.lang.String hashSaltWithPW(java.lang.String salt,
                              java.lang.String pw)
        Calculate a sha256 hash with the salt + the password
        Parameters:
        salt - the specific hash from the user
        pw - the password from the user
        Returns:
        the hashed value from the salt and the password
